Hero.subtitle: Automatically discover and monitor all assets on your network without installing software on endpoint devices.

Features.subtitle: Manage your IT assets with ease using our comprehensive set of features designed for modern businesses.
Features.zero-installation-desc: No need to install software on every device. Scan and monitor your entire network without touching endpoints.
Features.automatic-discovery-desc: Detect all devices connected to your network automatically, including servers, workstations, and IoT devices.
Features.monitor-desc: Get instant alerts when new devices connect to your network or when existing assets change status.
Features.dashboard-desc: Visualize your entire IT infrastructure with intuitive dashboards and detailed asset information.
Features.security-desc: Ensure compliance with industry standards like GDPR, HIPAA, and ISO 27001 for secure asset management.
Features.cloud-desc: Access your asset management system from anywhere using our secure cloud-based platform.
Features.scalable-desc: Perfect for businesses of all sizes, from small startups to large enterprises with thousands of devices.
Features.team-desc: Share asset information with your team and assign responsibilities for efficient management.

HowItWorks.description1: Our system connects to your network using a small secure appliance or through your existing infrastructure. No complex setup required.
HowItWorks.description2: Synovo automatically discovers all devices connected to your network, identifying their type, specifications, and installed software.
HowItWorks.description3: Monitor the status of all your IT assets in real-time. Get alerts for new devices, status changes, or potential security issues.
HowItWorks.description4: Start gaining insights into your IT infrastructure within minutes of setup. Generate reports, track changes, and optimize your assets.
HowItWorks.subtitle: Get started in minutes with our simple four-step process
HowItWorks.videoDescription: Watch how Synovo discovers and monitors your entire IT infrastructure in minutes without installing any software on individual devices.

Pricing.subtitle: Pay only for the assets we detect. No hidden fees, no complicated pricing structures.
Pricing.customDescription: We offer custom pricing and features for organizations with specific requirements. Contact our sales team to discuss your needs.

Starter.name: Starter
Starter.description: Perfect for small businesses just getting started with asset management.

Business.name: Business
Business.description: Ideal for growing businesses with expanding IT infrastructure.
Business.feature6Tooltip: Support available 24/7 including weekends and holidays
Business.feature7Tooltip: Create and schedule custom reports based on your requirements

Enterprise.name: Enterprise
Enterprise.description: For large organizations with complex IT environments.

Testimonials.subtitle: Join hundreds of businesses that use Synovo to manage their IT assets effortlessly

1.quote: Synovo transformed our IT asset management process. We used to spend days manually auditing devices, but now it's all automated and in real-time.

2.quote: The zero-installation approach is a game-changer. We deployed Synovo across our entire network without touching a single endpoint device.

3.quote: As a financial institution, security is our top priority. Synovo gives us complete visibility without compromising our strict security protocols.
